attributes.action: 'IT STOPS NOW!' TOUGHER SENTENCING FOR CHILD SEX OFFENDERS, CHILD ABUSERS, CHILD NEGLECT AND A FAIL TO PROTECT ANY CHILD UNDER THE AGE OF 16 IN THE UK
attributes.additional_details:
'IT STOPS NOW!'

THIS PETITION IS TO LOOK AT A COMPLETE OVER HAUL OF THE JUSTICE SYSTEM FOR CHILD SEX OFFENDERS, ABUSERS AND CHILD NEGLECT AGAINST ANY CHILD UNDER THE AGE OF 16 IN THE UK ALONG WITH  'A FAIL TO PROTECT' LAW.

IT IS TIME WE SAID 'IT STOPS NOW!'

I PETITION FOR A MINIMUM OF A 10 YEAR CUSTODIAL SENTENCE WITHOUT PAROLE FOR ANYONE FOUND GUILTY OF SEXUAL OFFENCES TOWARDS A MINOR AND TOUGHER PUNISHMENTS FOR CRIMES OF PHYSICAL AND EMOTIONAL ABUSE, NEGLECT AND AS A PARENT  'A FAIL TO PROTECT' REGARDLESS OF A FIRST OFFENCE.

AN ACT OF COMPLETE SELFISHNESS WHICH UTTERLY TEARS PEOPLES LIVES APART. FOR TO LONG OUR PUNISHMENT FOR ONE OF THE SICKEST CRIMES COMMITTED IN THE WORLD TODAY HAS NOT BEEN MET IN SEVERITY.

THESE PREDATORS PREY ON THE MOST PRECIOUS, INNOCENT AND VULNERABLE OF OUR SOCIETY.

LET US BE THERE VOICE! PLEASE, PLEASE, HELP ME TO SHOUT OUT WHAT THEY CAN NOT.......

'IT STOPS NOW!'
